page.shortlink: api objects security object change password method
page.description: Changes the password for the user.
page.syntax: Context.Security.ChangePassword as L (UserName as C, OldPassword as C, NewPassword as C)

argument.name: UserName
argument.description: The name of the user as is used during login.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the user's password was changed; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.ChangePassword() changes the password for the user. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
